body_html:
Having just looked at this, I think it runs the risk of slowing down a performance critical kernel with a comparison + addition per index in the CPU kernel (since the inner dimensions of the gather are a bulk memcpy on CPU), and a comparison + addition per gathered value in the GPU kernel.

@AnishShah -- have you run the gather benchmarks with your implementation? Do you have a GPU for benchmarking the GPU kernel?
